title: Ambient Video Game Music - Lava Fields 2
description: We're thrilled to present the anticipated sequel to our renowned collection of volcanic ambience packs.
longDescription:
We're thrilled to present the anticipated sequel to our renowned collection of volcanic ambience packs. This follow-up collection of 10 packs further delves into the raw intensity of recently erupted volcanoes, expanding the sonic palette for game developers crafting searing, lava-filled landscapes.


In each pack, the vivid sounds of bubbling hot lava return with even greater intensity. These packs capture the diverse tonal range of molten flows, from the deep, resonating tremors of an impending eruption to the light, crackling sizzle of lava streams cooling in the open air. The lifelike accuracy of these sounds will envelop players in a world where the ground beneath them could change at any moment.


This sequel introduces an array of new ambient sounds that punctuate the volatile atmosphere of a volcanic field. The packs now include the ominous rumbling of shifting tectonic plates, the sharp cracks of fracturing rock, and the intimidating echo of lava tubes forming and collapsing.


A new, expertly composed track ties these packs together. This soundtrack successfully combines the natural and imposing sounds of the volcanic field, mirroring the raw power and dynamism of these awe-inspiring landscapes.


Perfect for game developers seeking to intensify their volcanic environments, this follow-up collection offers an even more immersive and vibrant auditory journey. The meticulously designed sounds capture the thrilling spectacle of volcanic activity, allowing players to virtually step onto the sizzling terrain of an erupting volcano. With this sequel, your gaming experiences will ignite with authenticity and excitement, simulating the awe-inspiring sensation of witnessing earth's most forceful natural display.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nM-o-7Frfjc

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V1LJIhO9YuA

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rri-KA67F6k


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
